title: Brand
description: A brand is a name used by an organization or business person for labeling a product, product group, or similar.

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.

aggregateRating.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

slogan.description: A slogan or motto associated with the item.
